tool_description: An API that allows you to query the latest climate change news around the world.
title: Live Climate Updates

api_list.name: Get Individual News Related To Climate Change
api_list.description: Pull climate change information from a specific newspaper operator.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-updates.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspapername}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All News Endpoint Related To Climate Change
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about climate change from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-updates.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
